sandy.parser.IParser

type
interface
implements
flash.events.IEventDispatcher
version
3.1
since
1.0
The IParser interface defines the interface that parser classes such as ColladaParser must implement.

Instance Variables

parse(default,method) : Void -> Void

This method starts the parsing process.

standardAppearance(null,__setStandardAppearance) : sandy.materials.Appearance

Creates a transformable node in the object tree of the world.
